text: Valery Savin (born 21 June 1951) is a Soviet ski jumper. He competed in the normal hill event at the 1984 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of the Soviet Union Category:Ski jumpers at the 1984 Winter Olympics Category:People from Sakhalin Oblast
title: Valery Savin
